title: Rito
description: A social bookmarking service built on the AT Protocol. It provides a place to bookmark and share anything on the web, simply and with attention to detail.

ogp.title: Rito
ogp.description: A social bookmarking platform connecting users and developers.

error.delay: Currently, Rito is experiencing delays, and it may take longer to register or update bookmarks. Please try again after some time.
error.missingscope: A new feature has been added in Rito. Please log out and log in once more.

allbookmark.title: Bookmarks
allbookmark.description: Manage Bluesky and websites together with your Bluesky account
allbookmark.longdescription: You can manage Bluesky and websites with your Bluesky account. Add comments and tags to bookmarks for convenient organization.

atproto.title: Build with ATProtocol
atproto.description: Supports ATProtocol and stores everything in your PDS
atproto.longdescription: Fully compatible with ATProtocol, all data is stored in your PDS.

ownerbenefit.title: Owner Verified Comments
ownerbenefit.description: Owner of ATProtocol-based products can add descriptions to their products
ownerbenefit.longdescription: Product owners can create special bookmarks that display their service description at the top of the bookmark list.

chrome.title: Chrome Extension
chrome.longdescription: You can quickly bookmark to Rito from the extension tab. Tab here for details.

bookmarklet.title: Bookmarklet
bookmarklet.longdescription: You can quickly bookmark to Rito directly from your bookmarks. Tab here for details.

login.title: Login
login.titleDescription: Log in with your Bluesky account
login.redirect: Authenticating. You will be redirected to sign in page if necessary.

error.whitespace: Handle cannot contain spaces, line breaks, or tabs

mybookmark.login: Please log in to manage your bookmarks

create.title: Register Bookmark
create.description: Comments and tags will be public.

url.title: URL
url.descriptionForOwner: It will be treated as an owner bookmark.

tag.title: Tag
tag.description: Tags to categorize the URL (up to 10)

inform.canverify: You can register a verified comment for this URL
inform.needlogin: Login is required to register a bookmark

error.cannotgetogp: Could not retrieve the title from the site

delete.title: Delete Bookmark
delete.description: Do you want to delete this bookmark?

detail.needlogin: You need to log in to view comments

invalid.title: No AppView URL exists for this NSID

error.schemaRequired: Either rkey or did is required

status.title: Status
status.description: Updates the status of Rito every 1 minutes

share.title: Share on Bluesky
share.description: Do you want to share this Rito URL in a Bluesky post?
share.ogpdecription: Check out the bookmark shared by {0}
